"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549e373c63687260c4610200#post_549e373c63687260c4610200
Actually, the pony fandom have more crossover art and fics than the sonic fandom. People find it annoying that cute little ponies are portraying or making team with other characters.
But ff you want to see a fandom that is practically in _everywhere_, is the pokemon fandom.
